description: The default port 8080 conflicts with the one needed for Decky/Steam Devk homebrew. Changing the port in the syncthing config make Syncthing start working if you launched it manually, though syncthing-gtk was just an empty window with no way to seemingly change it.
summary: Doesn't play nice with Steam Deck Homebrew

description: worked fine on steam deck for a while, now it fails too load and says connection to daemon failed. seems to be same issue as multiple commenters, dissapointing
summary: was working, suddenly fails too load

description:
This is a nice Gnome wrapper for the Syncthing app
Flatpak version could use a little work, but it seems to run for the most part. I only had a couple of hickups at the beginning, but now I don't remember what they were. It's been working great, otherwise.
Only thing I can think of is that there is some message in my system logs about an undefined "myLog" variable or something.
summary: A great way to keep file in sync across systems

description: GUI could look nicer, but it works great and does everything the Web UI does.
Syncthing is one of the best solutions to wel... sync things! The core works great on almost any platform out there, though the GUIs can be a bit buggy at points.
summary: One of the best solutoins out there
Probably the easiest P2P solution out there

description: On Steam Deck, one day it just starts failing to load. It says connection to daemon failed to load, invalid HTTP response. I didn't change anything so no idea what happened.
summary: It stopped working, but when it works it's great

description: Synchronisiert Windows, Android, Linux, Synology DSM etc. ohne Probleme. Schönes Programm!
summary: Tut was es soll - und das sehr gut!

description:
Having to disable "receive only" and "file versioning on" for every new folder sucks... 

Please add a feature to set this permanently for every folder.

Why are those on by default anyway? Doesnt make sense if you use your Desktop machine as a real back-and-forth sync device.
Permet de mettre en place une architecture type cloud distribuée, sans enregistrer ses données sur des serveurs tiers
summary: Bonne alternative aux clouds traditionnels pour le partage de fichiers

description: Классная утилита для создания собственного облака для обмена с другими компьютерами по локальной сети. К тому же, объем файлов на сервере не ограничен. Всем советую!
